input.sentences: [male] and [female] did a really great job planning their renaissance themed wedding .
( although | even though the bride and groom looked wonderful | i could n't help thinking about the red wedding from game of thrones. )
the cake was absolutely a work of art .
and it went well with great conversation .
and | of course | great quantities of fermented beverages .
output.sentences: The wedding party stood outside to celebrate.
The bride and groom look happy to be spending their lives together.
The cake was castle inspired and delicious.
The family and friends shared many laughs.
And the men even shared some celebratory beers.
